areas.name: AI Infrastructure & Tooling
areas.description: Deployment and management of AI development tools, platforms, and infrastructure to support team productivity and collaboration

areas.name: Team AI Literacy & Skills
areas.description: Development of team competencies in AI tools, prompt engineering, and AI-first development methodologies

areas.name: Code Generation & Review
areas.description: Integration of AI assistance in code creation, review, and quality assurance processes

areas.name: Documentation & Knowledge Management
areas.description: Use of AI to automate and enhance documentation creation, maintenance, and knowledge discovery

areas.name: Intent-to-Architecture Translation
areas.description: AI-powered translation of business requirements and intent into technical architecture and system design

areas.name: AI-Driven Testing & Quality Assurance
areas.description: Automation of testing processes using AI for test generation, execution, maintenance, and quality prediction

areas.name: Continuous Integration & Deployment
areas.description: AI-enhanced CI/CD pipelines with intelligent decision-making, optimization, and automated deployment strategies

areas.name: Monitoring & Observability
areas.description: AI-powered system monitoring, anomaly detection, incident response, and predictive issue prevention

areas.name: Legacy System Modernization
areas.description: AI-assisted analysis, planning, and execution of legacy system transformation and modernization initiatives

areas.name: Data Governance & Management
areas.description: Governance frameworks and management systems for data used in AI development, ensuring compliance and quality

areas.name: Vendor & Tool Standardization
areas.description: Enterprise-wide standardization of AI vendors, tools, and platforms with strategic partnership management

areas.name: Integration with Enterprise Systems
areas.description: Connection and integration of AI development tools with existing enterprise systems (ERP, CRM, ITSM, etc.)

areas.name: Cost Management & ROI Tracking
areas.description: Financial management, cost optimization, and return-on-investment measurement for AI development initiatives

areas.name: Performance & Scalability Management
areas.description: Management of AI development practices scalability across teams, projects, and organizational growth

areas.name: Business Continuity & Disaster Recovery
areas.description: Resilience planning and disaster recovery capabilities for AI-dependent development processes and systems

areas.name: AI Ethics & Responsible AI
areas.description: Frameworks and practices ensuring ethical, fair, and responsible use of AI in software development

areas.name: Performance Measurement & Value Realization
areas.description: Systematic measurement and optimization of business value delivered through AI-first development practices

areas.name: Intellectual Property Management
areas.description: Management of intellectual property concerns and legal compliance for AI-generated code and content

areas.name: Risk Management & Security
areas.description: Identification, assessment, and mitigation of risks associated with AI-powered development processes

areas.name: Organizational Change Management
areas.description: Management of organizational transformation to AI-first development culture, processes, and operating models

areas.name: Cross-functional AI Collaboration
areas.description: Coordination and collaboration between AI agents and humans across different functional domains

areas.name: Regulatory Compliance
areas.description: Compliance management for AI development activities with applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards

areas.name: Innovation & Future Readiness
areas.description: Strategic preparation for emerging AI technologies and continuous innovation in development practices
